description: This header file defines API declarations for CCSP Wi-Fi Agent interactions via D-Bus, including functions for getting and setting parameters, managing entries, and component discovery.

methods.name: Cosa_Init
methods.description: Initializes the CCSP SnmpAgent Platform Access layer.

methods.name: Cosa_Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down and cleans up the CCSP SnmpAgent Platform Access layer.

methods.name: Cosa_FindDestComp
methods.description: Finds the destination component and path supporting a specific namespace.

methods.name: Cosa_GetParamValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values from a specified component and path.

methods.name: Cosa_SetParamValuesNoCommit
methods.description: Sets parameter values without committing the change immediately.

methods.name: Cosa_SetCommit
methods.description: Commits or rolls back parameter changes.

methods.name: Cosa_GetInstanceNums
methods.description: Retrieves object instance numbers for a specific object path.

methods.name: Cosa_AddEntry
methods.description: Adds an entry to a configuration table.

methods.name: Cosa_DelEntry
methods.description: Deletes an entry from a configuration table.

methods.name: Cosa_FreeParamValues
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for parameter value arrays.

methods.name: Cosa_BackgroundCommit
methods.description: Performs background commit or rollback of configuration changes.
